description:
* Based on a super hero manga series written and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr44143 [Horikoshi Kouhei].
http://anidb.net/ch92566 [Deku], http://anidb.net/ch78627 [Bakugou] and http://anidb.net/ch79988 [Todoroki] has grown stronger during their internship. On the other hand, http://anidb.net/ch87108 [Shigaraki] awakened by regaining the miserable memories of his childhood during the battle with http://anidb.net/ch118305 [Re-Destro]. Afterwards, Shigaraki leads the Paranormal Liberation, gradually expands its force, and seeks new power in order to destroy everything. Deku and Shigaraki. Heroes and villains. The all-out war is going to begin!
Source: Ani-One Asia

REGULAR.description:
Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the Paranormal Liberation Front led by Shigaraki.
Source: crunchyroll

Mirko chases after Garaki while the rest of Team Endeavor deals with Nomus at Jaku Hospital. Meanwhile, Team Edge Shot charges in for a surprise attack at Gunga Villa.
Source: crunchyroll

Inside Gunga Villa, the Paranormal Liberation Front realizes that they are under attack, and Twice confronts Hawks about his betrayal.
Source: crunchyroll

Hawks`s confrontation with Dabi leads him to think back on his past. Meanwhile, at the hospital, Mirko fights her way through multiple High Ends to get to Doctor and Shigaraki.
Source: crunchyroll

After reinforcements finally arrive, the tide is just starting to turn in the heroes` favor when Shigaraki wakes up.
Source: crunchyroll

As Endeavor tells his team that he`s fighting Shigaraki, Midoriya realizes that Shigaraki is after One For All and uses himself as bait to try to lure Shigaraki away from the civilians.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Endeavor is up against Shigaraki while Gigantomachia breaks through the heroes surrounding Gunga Villa and is headed toward Team Edge Shot`s rear guard.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 災害歩行[ディザスターウォーカー]

REGULAR.description:
Led by Yaoyoruzu, the U.A. Class 1-A and 1-B work study students take on Gigantomachia as he heads their way with the League of Villains on his back!
Source: Funimation

titles.title: League of Villains vs. U.A. Students
敵[ヴィラン]連合vs雄英生

REGULAR.description:
As Midoriya goes up against Shigaraki, Bakugo remembers a conversation he had with All Might when he was helping Midoriya train.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 爆豪勝己: ライジング

REGULAR.description:
Midoriya and Shigaraki enter the world of One For All as Gigantomachia continues north and Toga makes a detour.
Source: Crunchyroll

As Ochaco and Toga exchange words and blows, Gigantomachia reaches Shigaraki and the heroes, and Dabi reveals the secret of his past.
Source: crunchyroll

Best Jeanist appears and spins together the hopes of all the heroes in this fight as the climax of the all-out war draws near.
Source: Crunchyroll

Thinking of his great-great-grandfather, Mr. Compress performs his greatest trick in order to save the League of Villains.
Source: Crunchyroll

The heroes wrestle with changing public opinion as they deal with the aftermath of the fierce battle and mourn those they lost in the fight.
Source: Crunchyroll

Under All For One`s control, Shigaraki attacks Tartarus with the Nomus to free All For One`s body, freeing many other prisoners in the process.
Source: Crunchyroll

As heroes deal with criticism from the public, Hawks thinks back on his past with his family, and Endeavor`s family visits him in the hospital.
Source: crunchyroll

Endeavor and his family reflect on Toya`s past and the events that led to his death, and Hawks and Best Jeanist bring them a proposition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Wrong Way to Put Out a Fire

REGULAR.description:
Inside One For All, Izuku talks with the past wielders as the top three heroes deal with public sentiment after Dabi`s revelation.
Source: crunchyroll

After Izuku decides not to go back to U.A., he finds himself facing Muscular, who was broken out of jail, again and uses the Quirks of the past wielders against him.
Source: crunchyroll

The top three heroes continue to face criticism as they deal with jailbreakers and look for hints about All For One and Shigaraki`s whereabouts, and Izuku comes across a villain from Tartarus.
Source: crunchyroll

During Izuku`s fight with Lady Nagant, she tells him secrets about hero society that further solidify his resolve to help those who need his help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 麗しきレディ・ナガン

REGULAR.description:
As Izuku goes off alone in his quest for justice, his classmates realize something is wrong and try to find a way to help him.
Source: crunchyroll

As Deku tries to run away, Class A draws him back by recounting their memories with him and reminding him of his own words.
Source: crunchyroll
As the evacuees at U.A. voice their dissent, Ochaco speaks up to try and sway them. Onlookers with ties to Izuku try to figure out if it`s time for them to speak out, too.

As Izuku tries to rest and recover back at U.A. with his classmates, All Might has an encounter with Stain that leads to new information about Shigaraki and All For One.
Source: crunchyroll

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 僕のヒーローアカデミア_(アニメ)

titles.title: 僕のヒーローアカデミア (2022)
我的英雄学院 第六季
我的英雄學院 第六季
